Content:: Manusha Nanayakkara (born 24 September 1977) is a Sri Lankan politician, Cabinet Minister, and a current Member of Parliament for the Galle District. He is a journalist by profession and was educated at Mahinda College, Galle.[2][3]He was appointed as the Minister of Labour and Foreign Employment on the 20th of May 2022.[4]  This article about a politician from Southern Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
